items.name: Outdoor Security Camera
items.description: Add outdoor security wherever you need it with the versatile Stick Up Cam Battery. Featuring a flexible wire-free design, Stick Up Cam Battery can be placed on a flat surface, or wall-mounted for protection almost anywhere outdoors.

items.name: Roborock S8 Pro Ultra
items.description: Roborock's top-of-the-line two-in-one robot floor cleaner. One of the most powerful, feature-rich, and hands-off robot floor cleaners on the market.

items.name: Echo Show 15
items.description: Full HD 15.6 inch smart display with Alexa and Fire TV built in. Everything you need at a glance, family organisation and entertainment will look brilliant.
